name: BaiduBCECapture

license.text: Copyright (c) 2016 Baidu.com, Inc. All Rights Reserved.

description: Baidu BCE iOS Capture SDK supoort iOS 8.0 and later,
prepare_command:
VERSION="2.1.2"
BASEPATH="${PWD}"
SDKPATH="Baidu-Capture-SDK-iOS-${VERSION}"

rm -rf "${BASEPATH}/sdk"
mkdir -p "${BASEPATH}/sdk"

# copy framework
cp -R ${SDKPATH}/sdk/develop/VideoCore.framework "${BASEPATH}/sdk/"
